Key Match Events: Tapsoba (3' og.), Sinayoko (47') and Sinayoko (81') scored for Mali
Traore (57' pen.) scored for Burkina Faso
Tapsoba (27'), Badolo (72'), Tapsoba (81') received red cards
Pre-Game Insights: Mali have an unbeaten record against Burkina Faso with seven wins and one draw in eight encounters
Burkina Faso have reached the semi-finals or final in three out of the past five editions of the Africa Cup of Nations
Post-Match Reflections: Mali's adaptability and resolute defending have proven effective in the tournament so far
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mali's Lassine Sinayoko scored two goals against Burkina Faso
Bertrand Traore started for Burkina Faso after finding the back of the net for them in the first two matches as a substitute
Others: Mali's Yves Bissouma returned to the starting XI against Namibia and is tipped to keep his place
Dango Ouattara is set to lead the line for Burkina Faso
